meanings.definition: A board or panel at the foot of a bed, serving as a support for the feet.
meanings.sent1: The footboard of the bed kept my feet from hanging off the edge.
meanings.sent2: She rested her tired feet on the footboard before going to sleep.
meanings.sent3: As I tried to sneak out of bed, my foot got stuck on the footboard, making me stumble.
meanings.sent4: The footboard of the bed was like a loyal guard, always there to support me.
meanings.sent5: I painted colorful flowers on the footboard to brighten up the room.

meanings.definition: A board or panel at the foot of a vehicle, such as a carriage or sleigh, to protect passengers' feet.
meanings.sent1: The footboard of the carriage was sturdy, ensuring a smooth ride for the passengers.
meanings.sent2: The sleigh's footboard prevented the snow from reaching the passengers' feet.
meanings.sent3: During the bumpy ride, the footboard of the carriage turned into a mini dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The footboard of the sleigh shielded the passengers' feet like a protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: I engraved my initials on the footboard of the carriage as a memento of our journey.
